channel.title: Comments on: Foton for Warcraft Community Manager!

item.title: By: Silvanis
item.dc:creator: Silvanis
item.description:
It should be noted that 30k in Southern California is probably close to the poverty line...
I'm rather surprised that they listed the "we own you" requirement (24/7/365 on call? whee!)...does anyone REALLY want to work a job that's gaurenteed to get abuse from both the players AND your bosses?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I'll hazard. 30k? And that is a wild guess. Typical entry level glam position salary. I have no idea of course, but people would go cheap to get a foot in the door.
EDIT: The ridiculous prior experience is a wild card. Exactly how many people do they think have 3-5 years exp as Comm Mgr in the gaming industry? I wager that is negotiable, but the 30k isn't.
